image.prompt: Dynamic pixel art scene. A pixelated bee character excitedly plugging three glowing futuristic cartridges into a retro console server rack. Cartridges glow neon blue, green, and purple. Screen background displays 'SYSTEM UPGRADE: COMPLETE'. High contrast, lime green #ecf874 accents, energetic atmosphere, cozy retro gaming vibes like Stardew Valley.

reasoning: Focuses heavily on the high-value model additions (Imagen 4, Flux 2, Grok) which are major hooks for devs. The tone is casual but competent ('go build something weird').
